heading: Join the Developer Update Livestream! – April 24th
content: Patch 2.2.0 and Season 8 are getting closer and closer! Join the next Developer Update Livestream on April 24th to get ready for the patch! Indeed, the 2.2.0 PTR ended quite a few weeks ago and while we are patiently waiting for the patch to hit live, you can check out the to be prepared for Season 8! Our next Developer Update Livestream begins on and gives a preview of Season 8: Belial’s Return. Join members of the development team as they share details on what’s coming in our newest season. Tune in to learn more about the new questline coming with the season, new seasonal powers, and more. There will also be a Q&A segment at the end of the stream for players to field their questions directly to the team. Visit our official Diablo channels to watch live! Following the Developer Update Livestream’s conclusion, join us on our first Sanctuary Sitdown with Community Host, and our very own Charles Dunn talking all things Diablo IV. They’ll be in the to answer your burning questions. After the Livestream, we’ll post another article with a video of the chat so you can catch up on the details if you miss them. Are you ready for Season 8? We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 patch and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best and Resources as always. If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
